Title: Amar Bondhu Rashed
Writer: Muhammad Zafar Iqbal (novel), Morshedul Islam (screenplay), Barkat Ullah Maruf (screenplay)
Actors: Chowdhury Zawata Afnan, Rayan Ibtesham Chowdhury, Refayat Zinnat, Faiyaz Bin Zia
Plot: Amar Bondhu Rashed, a fictional story based on the Liberation War of Bangladesh and written by the popular children's literature Dr Mohammad Jafar Iqbal
